summary: This document is a consent resolution from the Board of Directors of Southern Trust Company, Inc., detailing the unanimous adoption of resolutions regarding the transfer of shares and a merger involving Jeffrey Epstein and related entities. It outlines the actions taken in lieu of a meeting, including the approval of a merger agreement and the issuance of additional shares to Epstein.
